title: Futuristic Watch Face
summary: Containing 6 unique futuristic watch faces for your Wear device.
description: Futuristic Watch Face contains 6 different watch faces for your Android Wear device. Works great at night.Features:- 6 different watch faces. You use the companion app to change the watch face.- 12/24 hour mode. 12 hour mode is the default setting. Switch between the modes in the companion app.- Works with normal ambient mode, low-bit ambient screen, and burn-in protection screen.- Auto re-size when large peek card is visible.
descriptionHTML:
Futuristic Watch Face contains 6 different watch faces for your Android Wear device. Works great at night.

Features:

- 6 different watch faces. You use the companion app to change the watch face.
- 12/24 hour mode. 12 hour mode is the default setting. Switch between the modes in the companion app.
- Works with normal ambient mode, low-bit ambient screen, and burn-in protection screen.
- Auto re-size when large peek card is visible.
